metadata.author: Woona
metadata.desc:
It's rare to see an enemy ship with five shield layers. So rare, it can really mess with your startegy. To make things worse, you can't possibly have more than 8 power allocated to shields, and the boss (strongest ship) has only 4 shield layers. It's logical to disable enemies from having 5 shield layers.
Also, I read about some nasty bug with asteroids. Don't know if true.
metadata.changelog: Enemy ships never have more than 4 shield layers.
